idea:
Quipp is an end to end digital marketing & communications agency born to deliver the best performance driven strategies.


When a balance is found between creative brand-development and lead-generation, a business has the opportunity to thrive. Our unique perspective and analytics allow us to strike the right balance for every business. 


We believe in not just building great visual identities but also making sure you're getting a return on every marketing investment. We are doing this by creating a new correlation between adding value, affordability and content creation.


At Quipp, we are constantly exploring, creating and growing to be the best today and in the future.
name: Quipp Marketing LLP

idea: We are one of the fastest growing EdTech companies that is revolutionizing the way people learn math. We provide One-on-One Online and In-home Math Tutoring to students of all ages . We have a beautifully designed and easy to use Online Tutoring platform that helps us reach students across the world. We serve students from KG to PG. We have a very systematic teaching methodology and unique approach towards simplifying maths for students across the globe. Our customers are parents who are looking for a quality tutor and personalized attention for their child. We help them with end-to-end solution for all their math tutoring needs instead of just matching a student with the right tutor. We are a B2C company and we generate revenue by charging hourly, monthly or yearly subscription fee to our clients.
name: EDUSPREE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
